fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may give a one-shot roleblock to any player at night, they may use it instead of their normal ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You will astrally attack any acting role that for any reason doesn't act during the phase(s) they can. Roles with limited uses aren't included until they have acted at least once, and roles that can win with the Mafia won't be attacked either.
